typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Email as string,
		Gender as string,
		Country as string,
		Address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> CustomerStage
source(output(
		SKCustID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Email as string,
		Gender as string,
		Country as string,
		Address as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		InsertDate as timestamp,
		ValidFromDate as date,
		ValidToDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> CustomerView
CustomerStage derive(SrcHash = md5(CustomerID)) ~> HashSource
CustomerView derive(DimHash = md5(CustomerID)) ~> HashDimension
HashSource, HashDimension exists(SrcHash == DimHash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> HashInsert
HashInsert derive(Gender = case(case( Gender=='Male',1,Gender=='Female',2)==1,'Male',
     case( Gender=='Male',1,Gender=='Female',2)==2,'Female'),
		IsActive = 1,
		InsertDate = currentUTC('dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm'),
		ValidFromDate = currentUTC('dd-MM-yyyy'),
		ValidToDate = toDate('99993112','yyyyddMM')) ~> Insertattributes
